description: Number of partitions of n into parts 8k or 8k+2.
formula: If n is even, a(n) ~ 2 * exp(Pi*sqrt(n/6)) * Gamma(5/4) / (6^(3/8) * Pi^(3/4) * n^(7/8)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 26 2015
mathematica: nmax = 100; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/((1 - x^(8k+8))*(1 - x^(8k+2))), {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 26 2015 *)
